#include<cstdio>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    long int t,n,sum;
    scanf("%ld",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        scanf("%ld",&n);
        if(n%2==0)
        {
            sum=n/2;
            sum*=(-1);
        }
        else
        {
            sum=(n+1)/2;
        }
        printf("%ld\n",sum);
    }
    return 0;
}
